title: A chiral quark model analysis of the $\bar KN$ interaction
authors:
M. Conde-Correa, T. Aguilar, A. Capelo-Astudillo, A. Duenas-Vidal, J.
  Segovia, P. G. Ortega
abstract:
In this work we analyze the $\bar KN$ interaction in the framework of a
constituent quark model. The near-threshold elastic and charge exchange cross
sections are evaluated, finding a good agreement with the experimental data.
Furthermore, the possible existence of $\bar KN$ bound states are explored,
finding two poles in the isoscalar $J^P=\frac{1}{2}^-$ sector that can be
interpreted as the experimental $\Lambda(1405)$ state.
